content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
--------------------
### Iron Smelting Furnace at Position(5.0, 5.0)
Consists of a furnace located at (5.0, 5.0) used to process iron ore into iron plates. This furnace was employed during the recovery steps to boost the iron-plate count through smelting operations.

### Copper Smelting Furnace at Position(-27.0, -60.0)
Consists of a furnace located at (-27.0, -60.0) used to process copper ore into copper plates. It was used in the copper plate production step to resolve the resource shortage for subsequent crafting requirements.

No Lab has been successfully placed or crafted on the map despite multiple attempts.

ERROR TIPS
----------
• API Parameter Inconsistencies with get_entities  
  – Avoid using unsupported keyword arguments such as 'radius' and ensure the parameters match the function’s expected signature to prevent TypeErrors.

• Lab Placement Failures  
  – Verify that the inventory contains a Lab before attempting to place one. Ensure placement commands target locations that are unoccupied and eligible for the Lab entity.

• Iteration on a NoneType Result  
  – Confirm that calls retrieving collections (such as labs = get_entities(...)) return a valid list. Fallback to an empty list when a None value is encountered prior to iterating.

• Insufficient Resources for Lab Crafting  
  – Ensure that all prerequisite items (iron-gear-wheels, electronic circuits, copper cables, etc.) are available and that their production chains (smelting and crafting) are operating properly before reattempting Lab creation.
